quotes.text: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: If you are not willing to risk the usual you will have to settle for the ordinary.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Just when the caterpillar thought the world was ending, he turned into a butterfly.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.text: Whenever you see a successful person you only see the public glories, never the private sacrifices to reach them.
quotes.author: Vaibhav Shah

quotes.text: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosserh

quotes.text: Try not to become a person of success, but rather try to become a person of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.text: Real difficulties can be overcome; it is only the imaginary ones that are unconquerable.
quotes.author: Theodore Vail

quotes.text: What would you do if you weren't afraid.
quotes.author: Spencer Johnson

quotes.text: Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above it.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.text: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.text: Don't let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.text: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream, not only plan, but also believe.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.text: Our greatest fear should not be of failure but of succeeding at things in life that don't really matter.
quotes.author: Francis Chan

quotes.text: Two roads diverged in a wood and I  took the one less traveled by, and that made all the difference.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: If you want to make a permanent change, stop focusing on the size of your problems and start focusing on the size of you!
quotes.author: T. Harv Eker

quotes.text: Don't let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki
